page.title: 04Games We Play
page.content: {Not Last Night}is a skipping game three or more people can play. Someone stands in the middle. The two people holding the ends of the rope keep turning it round and round they keep doing this until they have finished saying the rhyme, the rhyme goes like this: Not last night but the night before 24 robbers came knocking at my door, as I went out to let them in this is what they said to me: Spanish lady turn around Spanish lady touch the ground Spanish lady do the high kicks Spanish lady do the splits. What ever they say in the ryhme you must do whilst still skipping. This is one of the games we play at our school.
